title: Any Script MCP Configuration
description: Configuration schema for any-script-mcp - MCP server that exposes arbitrary CLI tools and shell scripts as MCP Tools via YAML configuration

name.description: Unique identifier for the tool. Must contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens

description.description: Comprehensive description for AI to understand when and how to use this tool

type.description: Data type of the input parameter

description.description: Clear description for AI to understand the parameter's purpose and expected values

required.description: Whether this input parameter is required. Defaults to true

default.description: Default value if the input is not provided

additionalProperties.description: Input parameter definition for a tool

inputs.description: Input parameters for the tool. Keys must contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens

run.description: Shell script to execute when the tool is invoked

timeout.description: Maximum execution time in milliseconds. Defaults to 300000 (5 minutes)

tools.description: List of tools to expose via MCP
